ClientCacheSize.description: The size of the client cache.

ApplicationId.description: Gets or sets the value sent as the first part of "User-Agent" headers for all requests issues by this client. Defaults to 'Azure.Core.DiagnosticsOptions.DefaultApplicationId'.

DefaultApplicationId.description: Gets or sets the default application id. Default application id would be set on all instances.

IsDistributedTracingEnabled.description: Gets or sets value indicating whether distributed tracing activities ('System.Diagnostics.Activity') are going to be created for the clients methods calls and HTTP calls.

IsLoggingContentEnabled.description: Gets or sets value indicating if request or response content should be logged.

IsLoggingEnabled.description: Get or sets value indicating whether HTTP pipeline logging is enabled.

IsTelemetryEnabled.description: Gets or sets value indicating whether the "User-Agent" header containing 'Azure.Core.DiagnosticsOptions.ApplicationId', client library package name and version, 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeInformation.FrameworkDescription' and 'System.Runtime.InteropServices.RuntimeInformation.OSDescription' should be sent. The default value can be controlled process wide by setting AZURE_TELEMETRY_DISABLED to true, false, 1 or 0.

LoggedContentSizeLimit.description: Gets or sets value indicating maximum size of content to log in bytes. Defaults to 4096.

LoggedHeaderNames.description: Gets a list of header names that are not redacted during logging.

LoggedQueryParameters.description: Gets a list of query parameter names that are not redacted during logging.

Delay.description: The delay between retry attempts for a fixed approach or the delay on which to base calculations for a backoff-based approach. If the service provides a Retry-After response header, the next retry will be delayed by the duration specified by the header value.

MaxDelay.description: The maximum permissible delay between retry attempts when the service does not provide a Retry-After response header. If the service provides a Retry-After response header, the next retry will be delayed by the duration specified by the header value.

MaxRetries.description: The maximum number of retry attempts before giving up.

Mode.description: The approach to use for calculating retry delays.

NetworkTimeout.description: The timeout applied to an individual network operations.

ConnectionString.description: Gets or sets the connection string used to connect to the table service account.

DisableHealthChecks.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the health check is disabled or not.

DisableTracing.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the OpenTelemetry tracing is disabled or not.

Endpoint.description: The Endpoint of the resource in Azure.

ProjectName.description: The name of the AI Foundry project to use.

ResourceGroupName.description: The name of the resource group the AI Foundry is deployed to.

SubscriptionId.description: The ID of the Azure subscription for the resource.
